history.proof: intros R z P Hz Hrewt s Hrewt_s. induction Hrewt_s. - apply Hz. - apply (Hrewt x y). + apply H. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + apply IHHrewt_s. * sfirstorder depth: 3. * sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros R z P Hz Hrewt s Hrewt_s.
exceptions.exn: In environment R : SRS P : string -> Prop z : SR.string nat Hz : P z Hrewt : forall x y, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y -> P x x, y : SR.string nat H : rew R x y Hrewt_s : rewt R y z IHHrewt_s : P z -> (forall x y, rew R x y -> rewt R y z -> P y -> P x) -> P y Unable to unify "P y" with "rewt R y z".

ctx: intros R z P Hz Hrewt s Hrewt_s.
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros R z P Hz Hrewt s Hrewt_s.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHHrewt_s0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros R z P Hz Hrewt s Hrewt_s. induction Hrewt_s. - apply Hz. - apply (Hrewt x y). + apply H. + apply IHHrewt_s. + apply IHHrewt_s0.
